data.actual_result: The page scrolls up a little bit which can be observed by looking at the shadow that falls on the cloud. The page isn't even scrollable.
data.expected_result: The image either stays in the same position or the page doesn't scroll.
data.short_description: When you switch orientation in the invite creation screen and click on the settings gear, make a few changes and click on create invite, the invite creation page scrolls up a little bit and it is impossible to scroll down that bit.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the create instant invite button of a server you have permission to create an instant invite. - Switch orientation. - Observe the place above the image. - Now, click on the settings gear, make a few changes in settings and click on create link. - Now, observe the place above the image.
